Key Match Events: José Ramírez launched a go-ahead solo home run in the fifth inning
David Fry hit a pinch-hit, two-run home run in the seventh inning
Emmanuel Clase locked down the save with a swinging K of Matt Vierling in the ninth inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers have already stood out as the Cinderella of the 2024 MLB postseason
The Guardians are now just nine outs away from being eliminated from the postseason
Others: The Tigers will have to send Tarik Skubal to the bump to carry the load once again in Game 5
The Guardians have not yet revealed their Game 5 starter
